mapper.update: update signet_users set begin_time = #{sUser.beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{sUser.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custody_man = #{sUser.custodyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_project = #{sUser.useProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_no=#{sUser.taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destroy_time = #{sUser.destroyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signet_no=#{sUser.signetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where su_id = #{sUser.suId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
